Bash(refreshed..." logs during auto-refresh
- ServiceManager: Suppress "Enumerated X services" log during auto-refresh
- ServiceManager: Track QueryServiceConfig2W errors per service and only
  log each error once (prevents spam for services with missing MUI files)
- MainWindow: Pass true for isAutoRefresh when triggered by timer

Result: Auto-refresh now only logs one debug line instead of 3+ info
lines, and repeated QueryServiceConfig2W errors are suppressed.
